name: Orb Life Simulator
description:
This is a game where you just look at Orbs live, eat trees, grow, populate and die.

Well, it would be boring to see them without interactions, so I gave the player powers that will somewhat influence the orbs and the island they are living in, which include:

1. Spawning Orbs. (just in case if they went extinct)

2. Spawning Killer Orbs. (To add competition)

3. Start a disease outbreak in orbs. (they can get immune)

4. Speed time. (so you won't get board playing)

5. Call in an Asteroid. (destroys all life on the island)

6. Kill all orbs at once. (why not?)

Minimum Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 or above
Processor: AMD or Intel with 2.50 GHz dual core
Memory: 4 GB DDR3 1866 MHz
Graphics: AMD or Nvidia GPU with 2 GB VRAM
DirectX: Version 10+
Storage: 1 GB
